articles.title: How to watch Apple’s WWDC 2025 keynote - TechCrunch
articles.summary: How to watch Apple’s WWDC 2025 keynote Apple is hosting its 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference from June 9 to 13. The keynote for this developer-focused event is scheduled for June 9 at 10 a. m. PT / 1 p. m. ET. The company is expected to unveil changes to its operating systems, including iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS.
